bibl.title: Physical Descriptions, Registration and εἰκονίζειν. With New Interpretations for P. Par. 65 and P. Oxy. I 34.
bibl.note: Greek and Demotic contracts in the Ptolemaic period. - Scribal traditions and physical descriptions. - εἰκονίζειν and P. Paris 65. - Physical descriptions and registration of contracts. - εἰκονισταί and P. Oxy. I, 34. - Conclusions.
bibl.seg: DEPAUW Mark, Physical Descriptions, Registration and εἰκονίζειν. With New Interpretations for P. Par. 65 and P. Oxy. I 34.

Greek and Demotic contracts in the Ptolemaic period. - Scribal traditions and physical descriptions. - εἰκονίζειν and P. Paris 65. - Physical descriptions and registration of contracts. - εἰκονισταί and P. Oxy. I, 34. - Conclusions.
